subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Colleges and Universities
Discrimination
lead_paragraph: Andre Dixon dragged defenders on a 5-yard touchdown run with 1 minute 32 seconds left and Connecticut overcame a late 10-point deficit to beat visiting Louisville, 21-17, getting some help from a controversial punt return.
snippet: Andre Dixon dragged defenders on a 5-yard touchdown run with 1 minute 32 seconds left and Connecticut overcame a late 10-point deficit to beat visiting Louisville, 21-17, getting some help from a controversial punt return.
